Docs.param: The socket that needs to be kept alive.
The executor on which callback will be invoked. The provided must run callback sequentially, otherwise the order of callbacks cannot be guaranteed.
A . Used for notifications about keepalive changes. Must be extended by applications that use this API.
Docs.summary: Request that keepalives be started on a IPsec NAT-T socket.
Docs.returns: A object that can be used to control the keepalive on the given socket.

Docs.param: integer specifying which networkType in which you're interested.
Docs.summary: Returns connection status information about a particular network type.
Docs.returns: a object for the requested network type or null if the type is not supported by the device. If networkType is TYPE_VPN and a VPN is active for the calling app, then this method will try to return one of the underlying networks for the VPN or null if the VPN agent didn't specify any.
